title: Bloomberg Markets: Salesforce Raises Annual Forecast
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Salesforce Raises Annual Forecast
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Anurag Rana\u0010Senior Analyst:Software & IT Services\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing Salesforce.com Inc. raised its revenue forecast for the fiscal year, showing confidence that its expanded lineup of cloud-based software will continue to attract customers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
